programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O mundo está abalado pela recente notícia do uso de drogas por um ícone amado, e todos estão se sentindo perdidos e traídos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman ganha seu próprio banheiro dizendo que ele é "transginger" claro significado de transgenero.Segredo de Randy é revelado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman foi diagnosticado com ansiedade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman conta para seus amigos sobre o seu sonho em que apareciam uns alienígenas que o abduzem e lhe introduzem uma sonda anal. Mas ao que parece, não foi apenas um sonho, já que algo está enlouquecendo as vacas deste pequeno vilarejo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman ganha o concurso "Salve o nosso frágil planeta" e é anunciado que Kathie Lee Gifford viajará a South Park para entregar o prêmio a ele em mãos, então, Cartmam decide entrar em forma tomando as pastilhas de Aumento 4000.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman descobre a verdadeira identidade do seu pai. Uma tempestade de neve prende os garotos no hospital. A equipe do America’s Most Wanted está na cidade. A equipe e os moradores ficam isolados e consideram o canibalismo.
programme.sub-title: A Mãe do Cartman Continua Sendo uma Vaca

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes estão em um dia de passeio pelo planetário e um dos funcionários lava o cérebro deles com efeitos visuais para que eles queiram voltar para lá.
programme.sub-title: Roger Ebert deveria demitir os alimentos gordurosos

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que é muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vários problemas com pedófilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associação De Sósias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Todos acham que Cartman está muito gordo e decidem enviá-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny está topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva às mais diversas insanidades.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Scott Tenorman é um rapaz do oitavo ano que engana Cartman ao vender seus pentelhos. Agora, ele fará o que for preciso para recuperar o seu dinheiro. Participação especial: Radiohead.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman recebe como herança de sua avó um milhão de dólares e decide cumprir seu maior sonho: comprar um parque de diversão somente para ele, no qual ele não precisa fazer fila para subir nos brinquedos, já que ninguém mais pode entrar.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se fantasia de um robô chamado "Genial-O 4000" e Butters acredita que ele de fato é um robô. Porém, a piada de Cartman se transforma em um pesadelo quando ele descobre que Butters tem um vídeo dele fantasiado de Britney Spears.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman estava tentando voar, mas o máximo que conseguiu foi um golpe na cabeça e isso fez com que ele ficasse dois dias em coma. A polícia local assume que agora Cartman tem poderes psíquicos e que pode resolver casos extraordinários.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos ficam com raiva de Cartman quando ele come a parte mais gostosa das asas de frango, e decidem ignorá-lo. Todos começam a fazer o mesmo. Ao ser ignorado por todos, ele começa a pensar que está morto e que agora é um fantasma.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman promove o ódio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele pálida, dizendo que eles não tem alma e não sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Al Gore visita a escola de South Park e tenta convencer Stan, Kyle, Cartman e Kenny para sair e caçar o perigoso homem-urso-porco. Ao ajudá-lo nesta missão, os rapazes acabam ficando presos em uma caverna.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mãe do Cartman quer encontrar uma maneira de controlar o seu filho. Ela busca ajuda em alguns programas de televisão, mas sem muito sucesso. Eis que surge César Millan, um adestrador de cães que aceita o desafio.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O senhor Garrison precisa explicar a Teoria da Evolução em aula, mesmo que isso vá totalmente contra os seus valores. Enquanto isso, Cartman mal pode esperar o dia em que lançam o seu novo videogame preferido.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman resolve congelar a si mesmo em uma tentativa desesperada de suportar a espera do lançamento do novo Nintendo Wii. Ele acaba despertando apenas 500 anos mais tarde, em um futuro nada agradável, e o pior de tudo: sem Nintendo Wii!

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman faz uma brincadeira que terminou com um mal-entendido envolvendo seu pai e uma posição um tanto quanto constrangedora. Agora, Butters deve ir a um acampamento de cura gay.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Após ver um garoto com Síndrome de Tourette em uma loja, Cartman fica obcecado por isso. Ele descobre que se aparentar ter a doença Tourette, ele poderá dizer o que quiser sem precisar encarar consequências.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Depois de receber um resultado inesperado ao realizar um exame de amígdalas, Cartman fica cara a cara com sua própria mortalidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Em tempos de aflição e grande desespero, um jovem de South Park decide manter a ordem na cidade. Surge Guaxinim, que se torna o vigilante solitário de South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O sonho de Cartman de viver a vida de um pirata se tornará realidade, se ele conseguir chegar à Somália.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman é escolhido para fazer os anúncios da manhã na escola de South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O restaurante favorito de Cartman foi fechado e substituído por uma loja que vende maconha medicinal. Enquanto Randy quer conseguir uma prescrição médica para comprar maconha, Cartman fará de tudo para ter de volta sua amada galinha frita.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman quer se tornar um corredor da NASCAR, mas ele acha que não tem condições porque não é "pobre e suficientemente estúpido" para alcançar seus sonhos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman tem um ataque de raiva quando os tamanhos dos pênis dos garotos são colocados no mural da escola de South Park e acabda sendo enviado para uma terapia de controle da raiva.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Noventa e nove por cento dos alunos estão contra Eric Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman finalmente admite que é gordo e providencia imediatamente uma scooter para se locomover.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman consegue se infiltrar na agência de segurança nacional.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Token é considerado por Cartman uma ameaça a toda a humanidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos criam uma empresa na qual eles não fazem nada, e enfim optam pelo nome "The Washington Redskins".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentágono até contarem exatamente como chegaram à Terra da Imaginação. Cartman não desistirá da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Quando estão na Terra da Imaginação, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exército de forças imaginárias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginárias não são reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginação.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As meninas do quarto ano fizeram uma lista secreta que dá nota a todos os garotos, do mais bonito ao mais feio. Os garotos roubam a lista e os resultados não são o que eles esperavam.

programme.title: South Park

programme.desc: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle, Cartman Kenny e Stan se juntam com os cidadãos de South Park e lutam bravamente contra a dominação de Nova Jersey em uma onda que está afetando todo o país

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".

programme.title: The African Queen
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: The Seven Year Itch
programme.desc: With his family away for their annual summer holiday, New Yorker Richard Sherman (Tom Ewell) decides he has the opportunity to live a bachelor's life. The beautiful but ditsy blond (Marilyn Monroe) from the apartment above his catches his eye.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: This hysterical comedy from director Billy Wilder finds Tony Curtis and Jack Lemmon masquerading as women in order to elude irate Chicago mobsters while befriending a beautiful singer (Marilyn Monroe).

programme.title: The Fortune Cookie
programme.desc: In their very first screen pairing, Walter Matthau (who would win a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his performance) and Jack Lemmon portray a crooked lawyer and his TV cameraman brother-in-law in this madcap tale of greed and recouping lost love.

programme.title: The African Queen
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Jerry Lewis directed, co-wrote and starred in this riotously funny movie that set a new standard for screen comedy and inspired the hit remake.

programme.title: The Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: A waning director revives his career after discovering a beautiful Spanish dancer and makes her into a Hollywood star. Ava Gardner, Humphrey Bogart and Edmond O’Brien star in this bitter tale of stardom won and wasted from Joseph L. Mankiewicz.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: For a decade, an elite team of intelligence and military operatives, working in secret across the globe, devoted themselves to a single goal: to find and eliminate Osama bin Laden. ZERO DARK THIRTY tells the story of history's greatest manhunt.

programme.title: Fat Man and Little Boy
programme.desc: In the remote desert of New Mexico, “The Manhattan Project” is materializing – the World War II effort to build the atomic bomb.

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude van Damme ("Bloodsport", "Cyborg") is a veteran undercover cop posing as an inmate in a dangerously corrupt state prison.

programme.title: Close Range
programme.desc: A rogue soldier turned outlaw is thrust into a relentless fight with a corrupt sheriff, his obedient deputies, and a dangerous drug cartel in order to protect his family.

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: 30 Days of Night
programme.desc: Josh Hartnett (The Black Dahlia, Pearl Harbor) crosses over to the dark side in this bone-chilling adaptation of the cult-hit graphic novel, brought to the screen in all its demonic glory.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaska’s population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husband’s murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Succubus
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Wes Craven Presents: Dracula 2000
programme.desc: Master of horror Wes Craven presents a sexy, modern-day, adaptation of the classic gothic thriller. After Dracula is awakened from his 100 year slumber, he makes his first destination America and the exotic city of New Orleans.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror film, from the director of [REC], a teenage girl (Anna Paquin) moves into a remote countryside house with her family, soon discovering horribly disturbing truths about the old place.

programme.title: Blood and Chocolate
programme.desc: The story takes place in modern day Bucharest and tells the tale of nineteen year old Vivian Gandillon, who has spent her life on the run from the truth that she is a werewolf.

programme.title: Rob Zombie's Halloween II
programme.desc: The survivors of Michael Myer's Halloween night killing spree recover from the chaos in the hours that follow, only to be faced with a new terror.

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: In order to win, the racers try to sabotage the race by any means necessary. Speed continues to race with his belief in fair play, but this motto comes to corner him. Speed aims to reach the goal driving the Mach 5, overcoming various obstacles.
programme.sub-title: The Race Around the World: Part 2

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: Go Mifune, a young and upcoming driver, drives a white-body super racing car named Mach 5. Speed enters his first race to win money for his family, against his father, Pops Racer.

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: Go enters the Sword Mountain Race behind his father's back. However, Ace and his gang attack the Mach 5, aiming to steal the blueprints of Pops Racer's new engine.

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: A masked racer, whose identity is in mystery, and whose face is concealed by a mask, came to Japan. He was a top racer but was also rumored to cause car crashes whenever he races.

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: Go was saved by a masked racer who is revealed to be Go’s older brother, Rex Racer. When Speed was at Rex’s house, he was mistaken for Rex and kidnapped by intruder.

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: Go tries to help a kind old man to find his stolen car. It turns out that the man is a son of a once infamous gang boss, and the classic car he drives has a map a stash of treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Classic Car (Part 1)

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: Go and the old man are captured by Blaggard, the boss of a gang. Speed fights back against the thugs and discovers where the treasure is hidden and offers Blaggard a deal.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Classic Car (Part 2)

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: Inspector Detector suspects that the criminals are mixed up in the No Limit World Race. It turns out the criminal are participating in the race on a Mammoth Car.

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: Go and Trixie learn that the Mammoth Car is the gold smugglers, but they fall into a trap. They are saved by a masked racer and pursue the Mammoth Car as it attempts to escape.

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: After being challenged, Go decides to race against him at upcoming Great Alpine Race. Will Go able to beat Snake who a member of a dangerous racing team 'Car Acrobatic Team'?

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: Go fell to the bottom of the valley during the race. However, Sparkle and his team managed to escape the crisis. Go heads for Hell Valley, the most difficult point of the race.

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: Trixie and her friends go to the rescue when they hear about Go’s accident in the Hell Valley. Racer X tries to guide Go, who tries to continue the race despite of an eye injury.

programme.title: Speed Racer [Japanese-Language Version]
programme.desc: A piece of paper with X3 written on it is left at the car murder scene. It turns out that there's a son of a car racer who seeks revenge behind the murderous streak.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsunayoshi Sawada is bad at studying, bad at sports, and clumsy at everything he does. But one day, a strange tutor appears before him.
programme.sub-title: What!? I'm a Tenth-Generation Mafia Boss!?

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: An unexpected transfer student, Hayato Gokudera, arrives in Tsuna's class, and for some reason, Gokudera hates Tsuna right from the beginning.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Two strangers arrive searching for Tsuna's house. Tsuna has become friends with Yamamoto and Gokudera, who is actually a member of the Vongola family.
programme.sub-title: Shocking! Cooking with Love and Horror!

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Haru has been watching Reborn ever since she fell in love with him at first sight. She gets the impression that Tsuna is a bad influence on him.
programme.sub-title: Eek! A Maiden's Heart Can Destroy!

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: The Disciplinary Commitee has immense power in Namimoi Middle School. Kyoya is the leader of the delinquents, and attacks anyone who is weak.
programme.sub-title: The Leader of the Disciplinary Committee Kills Time.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna is saved from a dog by I-Pin, a small child wearing Chinese clothes. I-Pin uses techniques which can only be described as psychic powers.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna goes to school in deathperation mode. When he returns to normal, he notices that he was dragging someone. The boy turns out to be Ryohei.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna returns home to find a bunch of frightening faces waiting for him. Tsuna rushes to his room to find a young man sitting. The man is Dino.
programme.sub-title: The Senior Boss Cares about the Family.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna suddenly becomes dizzy and a skull mark appears on his hand. According to Reborn, it is the symptom of an incurable illness known as Skullitis.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna forgets his lunch and Lambo ends up taking it to him. When Lambo bumps into I-Pin, a mix-up of packages results in a riot at school!

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Coaxed by Reborn, Tsuna blurts out that he's going to tell Kyoko that he loves her.
programme.sub-title: The Gyoza Buns of Love and Death!?

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Nana tells Gokudera to take care of Tsuna. But when he is unable to protect Tsuna from bees, Gokudera is embarrassed.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Reborn declares that the customary Vongola New Year Inter-family Battle will be held with Dino’s Chiavarone Family as their opponents!
programme.sub-title: New Spring! The Hundred Million Yen Contest

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Reborn has set up Tsuna on a date with Kyoko. Tsuna is thrilled, but when Tsuna meets Kyoko, he can’t seem to avoid running into people he knows.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Reborn has plotted another competition, as a snowball fight begins. What started as winter fun has turned into a battle for survival!

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Reborn appears to tell Tsuna that the place they're visiting is built exactly like Death Mountain, a secret Vongola training ground!

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna is hospitalized because of his injuries from Death Mountain, but his peaceful recovery is continually interrupted by his noisy friends.
programme.sub-title: Don't Make Noise When You're Hospitalized

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: It's Valentine's Day and Tsuna is curious to see who Kyoko will give chocolate to.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Futa, who is being chased by Mafioso, stumbles across Tsuna. Futa is an informant and you can control the world if you get hold of his ranking book.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: A sudden series of attacks have targeted Namimori Middle School's prefects. According to Ryohei, Kokuyo Middle School students are behind the attacks.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Dope
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a drug dealer throws the lives of three nerdy teens in Inglewood, CA into chaos in this coming-of-age adventure.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Advertising executive Marcus Graham is a quintessential bachelor, Graham is never without a new lady on his arm. Enter Jacqueline, his new boss, and Marcus is on the receiving end of his own patented behavior for the first time!

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Advertising executive Marcus Graham is a quintessential bachelor, Graham is never without a new lady on his arm. Enter Jacqueline, his new boss, and Marcus is on the receiving end of his own patented behavior for the first time!

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Double Impact
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune.

programme.title: Double Team
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Triple Threat
programme.desc: This breakneck thriller teams over half a dozen of the world’s biggest action stars for the martial arts event film of the year. When a hit is taken out on a billionaire’s daughter, it’s mercenaries versus assassins in an all-out war.

programme.title: Furie
programme.desc: When a little girl is kidnapped by a trafficking ring, they soon find they messed with the wrong child. Her mother, a notorious former gang leader, is close on their trail and will go to any lengths to bring her daughter home.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: In this vengeance-fueled thriller, a martial arts champion will stop at nothing to find her missing younger sister --hunting down the predators that kidnapped and assaulted her one by one.

programme.title: The Villainess
programme.desc: Bloody revenge is at the heart of this stylish action-thriller that doses the classic femme fatale story with a shot of adrenaline as it follows a former assassin who will stop at nothing to cut ties to her past.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: Two South Korean detectives are sent to Vietnam to extradite a suspect, where they uncover a series of connected murders and crimes against tourists.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
programme.desc: Comedy sensation Mike Myers stars with Nancy Travis in this hatchet-driven romantic comedy about a wedlock-shy coffee house poet who finally meets the perfect woman. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The Love Guru
programme.desc: A hilarious comedy starring Mike Myers as guru Pitka in his first original character since the blockbuster hit Austin Powers.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Idle Hands
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Licorice Pizza
programme.desc: Licorice Pizza' is the story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and falling in love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973. Written and Directed by Paul Thomas Anderson, the film tracks the treacherous navigation of first love.

programme.title: Postcards From the Edge
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Shirley MacLaine, Gene Hackman, Dennis Quaid and Richard Dreyfuss star in Mike Nichols' hilarious blockbuster film about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of today's Hollywood. Rated: R

programme.title: Safety Not Guaranteed
programme.desc: When an unusual ad inspires three cynical Seattle magazine employees to look for the story behind it, they discover a mysterious eccentric named Kenneth, a likable but paranoid supermarket clerk, who believes he's solved the riddle of time travel.

programme.title: Laggies
programme.desc: A woman (Keira Knightley) stuck in permanent adolescence lies to her fiancé about going on a retreat and spends the time hanging out with teenagers (Chloe Grace Moretz) instead. A comedy about acting your age and other adult decisions.

programme.title: Obvious Child
programme.desc: A one night stand leaves a woman (Jenny Slate) with an unexpected surprise just in time for Valentine's Day in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy that has critics audiences raving.

programme.title: We'll Never Have Paris
programme.desc: Simon Helberg, Melanie Lynskey and Zachary Quinto star in this hysterical tale, a clumsy and at once human account of screwing up on a transcontinental level in a noble effort to win back 'the one.' And it's based on a true story…unfortunately.

programme.title: Two Night Stand
programme.desc: A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand as the blizzard goes through the night.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Two girlfriends on a summer holiday in Spain became enamored with the same painter, fully unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he still has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

programme.title: A Chance Encounter
programme.desc: In a Sicilian town an aspiring poet in search of inspiration meets a folk singer.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Estranged from her family, Franny returns home when an accident leaves her brother comatose. Retracing his life as an aspiring singer-songwriter.

programme.title: Red Eye
programme.desc: Moments after takeoff, Lisa's seatmate, Jackson, menacingly reveals the real reason he's on board: He is an operative in a plot to kill a rich and powerful businessman .... And Lisa is the key to its success.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Killer Elite
programme.desc: A special-ops agent must rescue his mentor.

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: An undercover Las Vegas police officer with a connection to the criminal underworld scours a nightclub in search of his kidnapped son.

programme.title: Turbulence
programme.desc: A serial killer and a female flight attendant are left to battle for control of a plane. The FBI gives her coordinates so that she will crash into the sea and not at the airport...or will she?

programme.title: Lila & Eve
programme.desc: Lila, a grief-stricken mother reeling from her son's murder, attends a support group where she meets Eve, who urges her to take matters into her own hands to track down her son's killers. They soon embark on a journey of revenge, but also recovery.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as a brash Navy lawyer who's teamed with a gung-ho litigator (Demi Moore) in a politically explosive murder case, defending two Marines accused of killing a fellow soldier

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Matt Damon plays Rudy Baylor, a rookie lawyer in over his head on a high-profile case. Opposing him: an army of legal sharks. On Rudy’s side: Deck Shifflet, a feisty “paralawyer” who specializes in flunking the bar exam.

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: Courtroom thriller about a slick, hotshot lawyer (Richard Gere) who takes the seemingly unwinnable case of a young altar boy (Edward Norton) accused of murdering an eminent catholic priest.

programme.title: The Whole Truth
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves is a defense attorney trying to clear a teen in the brutal stabbing of his father. As more evidence comes to light, the whole truth seems darker than ever.

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: Oscar®-winners Anthony Hopkins (The Silence of the Lambs) and Emma Thompson (Howards End) reunite with the acclaimed Merchant Ivory filmmaking team for this extraordinary and moving story of blind devotion and repressed love. Rated PG

programme.title: Hamburger Hill
programme.desc: On the 11th May 1969, troops of the 101st airborne division engaged the enemy at the base of Hill 937 in the Ashau Valley. Ten days and eleven bloody assaults later, the troops who fought there called it Hamburger Hill.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Haunted by his past, WW-II veteran and drifter Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) crosses paths with a mysterious movement led by The Master (Phillip Seymour Hoffman) and his wife (Amy Adams).

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible 'Man With No Name' in lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money alongside Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach in this renowned, influential, and classic cinematic western directed by the great Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Sweetwater
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, a fanatical religious leader, a renegade Sheriff, and a former prostitute collide in a blood triangle on the rugged plains of the New Mexico Territory.

programme.title: Slow West
programme.desc: A bounty hunter (Michael Fassbender) keeps his true motive a secret from the naïve Scottish teenager (Kodi Smit-McPhee) he's offered to serve as bodyguard and guide while the youth searches for his beloved in 1800s Colorado.

programme.title: Sweet Country
programme.desc: Australian western set on the Northern Territory frontier in the 1920s, where justice itself is put on trial when an aged Aboriginal farmhand shoots a white man in self-defense and goes on the run as a posse gathers to hunt him down.

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Marshal Mike Blueberry, battles to unite the natives who raised him. He tries to maintain the balance between two civilizations. But when a destructive killer comes to town, ancient legend and the strongest cowboys take back what's theirs.

programme.title: The Journeyman
programme.desc: Orphaned since he and his brother were boys, a man tries to find and redeem the other who is now an outlaw in the Wild West.

programme.title: Savage State
programme.desc: When the American Civil War breaks out, a family of french settlers must abandon their Missouri home.

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: The family’s future grows bleak when the no-good nanny marries Fester and has the kids shipped off to summer camp. But Wednesday still has a Thing or two up her sleeve.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Dragonslayer
programme.desc: The young wizarding apprentice Galen, is sent to kill a dragon which has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom. Will his magic be enough to save him?

programme.title: Tomb Raider

programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally… another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats scatter when their search for gold uncovers a giant python, and Gan Fall reveals the tragic story of Jaya’s arrival in the sky. Meanwhile, Wyper readies the Shandorians for a raid on Eneru’s shrine!
programme.sub-title: A giant snake bares its fangs! The survival game begins!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the heartless god of Upper Yard eagerly anticipates the dawning of Sky Warefare, the Shandorian forces are savagely snared by the Ordeal of String, and Luffy wanders into the fight of his life!
programme.sub-title: The deadly reject! War demon wyper's resolve!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro rushes to perfect a deadly technique known as the Flying Blade Attack. The move proves difficult to master, but it could be the key to the swordsman surviving a battle with the Shandorian warrior, Braham.
programme.sub-title: Fierce midair battle! Pirate zoro vs. Warrior braham!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji and Usopp are driven to their knees by the electrifying presence of god, Luffy is nearly incinerated by Wyper’s Burn Bazooka, and Nami joins Gan Fall in a fight against two killer clones!
programme.sub-title: The roaring burn bazooka! Luffy vs. War demon wyper!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper unleashes the fury of his Rumble Ball during a sticky slugfest with a swap cloud spewing priest of Upper Yard. Can the little reindeer discover his opponent’s lone weakness before it’s too late?
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of the swamp! Chopper vs. Sky punk gedatsu!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami and the Knight of the Sky team up to obliterate two bumbling, balloon-shaped bad guys, and God Eneru relies on his astounding invincibility to torment a noble Shandorian warrior.
programme.sub-title: Unbeatable powers! Eneru's true form is revealed!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Robin’s search for a mystical city of gold is interrupted by Yama, one of Eneru’s faithful servants. When the rampaging warrior destroys some ancient ruins, he provokes the wrath of Robin’s many fists of fury!
programme.sub-title: A mystical city! The grand ruins of shandora!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Priest Ohm silences Chopper with an attack from which few – if any – ever recover. Meanwhile, Luffy begins to notice something strange about his cave-like prison, and four fearsome warriors prepare for battle!
programme.sub-title: 0% survival rate! Chopper vs. Ohm, the sword wielding priest!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro, Gan Fall, Wyper, Ohm, and a prizefighting pooch gather for a ferocious free-for-all at the site of the Upper Ruins. While the battle rages, Luffy tries to punch his way out of the belly of a poisonous python!
programme.sub-title: Climb giant jack! Deadly combat in the upper ruins!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro and Wyper are out to beat down the same bad guys, but will they realize it soon enough to survive a white-barbed death match of doom? Deep in the belly of the python, Nami and Luffy enjoy what could be a short-lived reunion!
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of iron! White barbed death match!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Eager to end their battle, Zoro aims the awesome destructive power of his 108 Caliber Phoenix at the sinister Priest Ohm! Elsewhere, god demands that Robin help him search for a legendary golden bell.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: God Eneru begins a deadly rampage aimed at exterminating the heavenly beings of Skypiea, and the ruins of Shandora become the scene of a bloody contest where survival is the name of the game.
programme.sub-title: Collapsing upper ruins! The quintet for the finale!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Gan Fall, Wyper, Zoro, and Robin join forces for an attack on God Eneru. Despite their furious onslaught, the four warriors prove powerless to harm the thunderous deity until Wyper utilizes the power of a mystical stone!
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the ancient ruins! Sky god eneru's goal!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: God Eneru makes a shocking recovery from wounds that should have ended his reign of terror. Zoro and Wyper muster the strength for one final stand, and Nami must choose between her friends – and survival.
programme.sub-title: Ambition toward the endless vearth! The ark maxim!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy emerges from his serpentine tomb with one thing on his mind: revenge! As the rubber-man sets out to settle the score with God Eneru, Conis rushes to warn her people of their impending doom!
programme.sub-title: They finally clash! Pirate luffy vs. God eneru!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the citizens of the sky run for their lives, Eneru issues in the dawn of Deathpiea! Luffy is determined to stop the madman, but first he must discover a way to lay hands on the heinous holy man!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A handful of gold sends Luffy hurtling towards his death, Sanji and Usopp mount a midair rescue mission, and Nami prepares for an electrifying showdown with God Eneru!
programme.sub-title: Luffy falls! Eneru's judgement and nami's wish!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp arrives just in time to save Nami from a lethal thunderbolt, but even their combined powers are no match for Eneru. While they scramble for an escape route, Sanji stealthily searches for a way to sabotage god’s ark!
programme.sub-title: The two awaken! On the front lines of the burning love rescue!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Despite being slowed by an arm encased in gold, Luffy races up a giant beanstalk on a mission to settle the score with Eneru! Elsewhere, the people of Skypiea feel the jolt of god’s wrath!
programme.sub-title: Capriccio for despair! The impending doom of sky island!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A flashback offers a glimpse at the lives of two legendary figures in Skypiea’s history: Montblanc Noland and the ferocious warrior Kalgara!
programme.sub-title: Led by a bell's sound! Tale of the great warrior and the explorer!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The look back at the legend of Montblanc Noland and Kalgara the warrior continues with the story of how these two very different men suddenly found friendship – and then lost it just as quickly!
programme.sub-title: Free from the spell! The great warrior sheds tears!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Montblanc Noland and the warrior Kalgara succeed in settling their difference before parting ways, but the laws of nature and man conspire to keep them apart – permanently!
programme.sub-title: Eternal friends! The vowed bell echoes across the mighty seas!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Eneru strikes Angel Island with a devastating lightning bolt, and Luffy continues his heroic climb up the giant beanstalk. The rubber-man refuses to stop until he rings the golden bell – no matter what the cost!
programme.sub-title: Angel island obliterated! The horror of the raigo's advent!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Eneru continues his thunderous barrage, Nami hatches a plan to give Luffy one more shot at a grudge match with god. Zoro’s at the center of the scheme, but he might not survive his mission!
programme.sub-title: Knock over giant jack! Last hope for escape!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami’s quick thinking gets Luffy closer to god, and the Straw Hat captain launches himself into the center of a sinister storm! Can he find a way to destroy Eneru’s looming cloud of death?
programme.sub-title: Miracle on skypiea! The love song heard in the clouds!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: In the aftermath of Luffy’s epic battle with Eneru, sunny skies chase away the storms, and the cloud-dwelling citizens of Angel Island turn their attention to rebuilding their homeland.
programme.sub-title: The battle ends! Proud fantasia echoes far!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Robin attempts to decipher the riddle of a mysterious poneglyph, Usopp barters with the locals, and Luffy raids the priceless treasures of the legendary city of gold!
programme.sub-title: I made it here! The yarn the poneglyphs spin!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With a little help from their new friends – and a giant octopus – the Straw Hats bid farewell to Skypiea and begin their descent back to the deep blue sea. Where they’ll land is anyone’s guess!
programme.sub-title: Off to the blue sea! A heartfelt finale!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After a frightening fall from the clouds, the Straw Hats find themselves trapped inside an impenetrable Marine stronghold. The crew gets separated, the Going Merry is impounded, and rumors of ghosts run rampant!
programme.sub-title: A state of emergency is issued! A notorious pirate ship has infiltrated!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Nami searches for the Going Merry, Luffy and Sanji pose as famous chefs, only to end up competing in a cooking contest with a beautiful mistress of the galley!
programme.sub-title: Sanji the cook! Proving his merit at the marine dining hall!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro is imprisoned and interrogated, and Chopper’s ill-chosen hiding spot lands him in the operating room along with a doctor who can’t stand the sight of blood!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy’s insatiable appetite betrays his true identity, and yet another member of his crew ends up in the brig when two Straw Hats try to fool Commander Jonathan with the same disguise!
programme.sub-title: The marine's dragnet closes in! The second member captured!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Commander Jonathan sets a Straw Hat trap, but Luffy and Sanji are willing to risk it all to help spring their mates. Will a souvenir from the sky save the day – or will their escape plan be scuttled by foul play?
programme.sub-title: Luffy and sanji's daring rescue mission!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joe Spade was once a formidable hitman of renown and Jigen's sharpshooter coach, he now comes to beg for Jigen's help; he had gotten old, flubbed a hit contract, and is now on the run.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: ICPO Bureau Chief Jasmine is an able commissioner. She uses the governor to spur Zenigata into action, as she has a secret plan to arrest Lupin. But Jasmine's plan is to make this mission her very last at ICPO so she could get married.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Nightlight Mask murdered the Duke of Le Mond and stole his diamonds. ICPO is having trouble solving the case, so they induct mystery author Conan Dorill as a special inspector. Dorill deduces that the true identity of Nightlight Mask is Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsène Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man…
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsène Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Running Man
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Alan Arkin and Jude Law star in this engrossing sci-fi thriller about an all-too-human man who dares to defy a system obsessed with genetic perfection. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Gamer
programme.desc: Set in a future world where humans can control other humans in mass-scale, multi-player online gaming environments, a star player (Butler) from a game called 'Slayers' looks to regain his independence while taking down the game's mastermind (Hall).

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation
programme.desc: Heather Mason and her father have always tried to stay one step ahead of the malevolent forces intent on their destruction. But on the eve of her 18th birthday, a dangerous revelation leads her deeper into a demonic world.

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic Thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Machete Kills
programme.desc: The machete-wielding federale returns in this sequel that pits him in a violent battle against a maniacal arms dealer and a revolutionary.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: One Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Marlon Brando’s only time as a Directo, Rio (Marlon Brando) also called "The Kid", his mentor Dad Longworth (Karl Malden), & a third man called Doc, rob a bank of two saddlebags of gold in Sonora, Mexico.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs, and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: One Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Marlon Brando’s only time as a Directo, Rio (Marlon Brando) also called "The Kid", his mentor Dad Longworth (Karl Malden), & a third man called Doc, rob a bank of two saddlebags of gold in Sonora, Mexico.

programme.title: Narc
programme.desc: Jason Patric stars as Nick Tellis, a suspended narcotics officer recruited to investigate the murder of Michael Calvess, a rookie cop killed under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: Action star Dwayne Johnson stars as Driver, now a free man after a decade in prison, focused on hunting down the people responsible for the brutal killing of his brother. But fast on his mission are two men who will do anything to stop him.

programme.title: Southland Tales
programme.desc: SOUTHLAND TALES is an ensemble piece set in the futuristic landscape of Los Angeles, as it stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) is an action star who's stricken with amnesia.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: Narc
programme.desc: Jason Patric stars as Nick Tellis, a suspended narcotics officer recruited to investigate the murder of Michael Calvess, a rookie cop killed under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: Action star Dwayne Johnson stars as Driver, now a free man after a decade in prison, focused on hunting down the people responsible for the brutal killing of his brother. But fast on his mission are two men who will do anything to stop him.

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Saddled with grief and surrounded by enemies, members of the group try to find safety at the Hilltop before it's too late.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Someone stumbles upon a brand new society unlike anything seen before.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A deeper look at the Sanctuary and the world of the Saviors; members of Alexandria look for supplies.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others are led to a new community, where they meet the residents and their ruler; a familiar face resurfaces.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: While searching for a missing Alexandrian, Rick and his group encounter a mysterious collective, its inhabitants unlike any they have come across.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: An Alexandrian discovers they must navigate the mysterious, confusing and terrifying world within the Saviors' compound.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group scavenges for supplies; back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Saviors visit the Hilltop unexpectedly, surprising everyone, with plans of taking more than supplies.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A group of Alexandrians embarks on a journey; one member of the group must make a heartbreaking decision.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The stakes continue to grow higher as paths cross; the group enacts an intricate plan.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and his group, along with the Kingdom and Hilltop, have banded together to bring the fight to Negan and the Saviors.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The plan involving Alexandrians, Kingdommers and Hilltoppers unfolds; as Rick continues to fight, he encounters a familiar face.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Conflict with the Saviors leads to unintended consequences for the Hilltop, the Kingdom, and Alexandria; morality proves tricky in wartime.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A new weapon in the Savior arsenal proves to be a giant hurdle as fighting continues between Rick's forces and those of the Saviors.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A close look at Negan and the lives of the Saviors during the conflict through a familiar set of eyes.

programme.title: Apex

programme.title: Everly
programme.desc: Uma mulher desesperada deve se defender de dezenas de assassinos enviados por seu implacável ex.

programme.title: Celular
programme.desc: O filme é uma história arrepiante sobre a jornada de um pai para encontrar sua esposa e seu filho. Clay Riddell se encontra em Boston e, de repente, o inferno se abre diante de seus olhos. Sem aviso prévio, a carnificina e o caos reinam. Pessoas comuns são vítimas dos atos mais vis, da destruição mais animalesca. E o apocalipse começa com a chamada de um telefone celular.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Profissão de Risco
programme.desc: Jack é contratado por Dragna, um chefão do crime, para realizar uma tarefa aparentemente inocente: ele deve levar uma mala para um motel em Nova Orleans e esperar que ela seja recolhida. Mas Jack nunca conseguirá abrir a mala. Mas, no momento em que ele entra no motel, sua vida está em risco. Vários criminosos tentam tirar a bolsa dele e Jack precisa defendê-la se quiser viver.

programme.desc: O neto de um lendário ladrão reúne uma equipe de criminosos para roubar um colar da Cleópatra que está dividido em duas partes, com dois donos distintos, um aliado que virou rival e um magnata do submundo.

programme.desc: Huo An une seu exército a uma legião de soldados desertados para proteger seu país do líder romano, Tibério.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: Um Verão Inesquecível
programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota má. À medida que a competição esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: Tempo de Mudançcas
programme.desc: Enviada para o rancho do seu pai nos EUA durante o verão, uma adolescente e seu cavalo Lucky Lass competem por uma vaga no National Youth Rodeo.

programme.title: Encontrando O Amor Em Sugarcreek
programme.desc: Jogador de beisebol Miquéias Matias e seu filho Bobby se acabar na pitoresca comunidade Amish de Sugarcreek, Ohio em um conjunto de aliases. Três Amish irmãs execução de uma antiga quinta inn levá-los debaixo das suas asas, e empregar Mica como um faz-tudo.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Elias
programme.desc: A multidão silencia com as palavras do profeta Elias. Relâmpagos e trovões ecoam no Monte Carmelo.

programme.title: Meus Vizinhos Alienígenas
programme.desc: Quando um astronauta mundialmente famoso volta para casa após sua última missão, ele traz uma lembrança única para sua esposa e dois filhos: um pedaço de um asteróide que caiu em sua estação espacial.

programme.title: Walt, Antes de Mickey
programme.desc: Baseado no livro "Walt Antes do Mickey", conta os primeiros anos da carreira de Walt Disney.

programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota má. À medida que a competição esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: A noite dos mortos
programme.desc: É Halloween em 1997, e também a última noite na escola para dois adolescentes skatistas, que vão deixar para trás a fase escolar e adentrar na famosa fase adulta. Mas, para um deles, Corey, alguns assuntos do passado ainda precisam ser resolvidos envolvendo um velho conhecido da infância. Para isso, os dois vão embarcar em uma viagem apavorante através de suas memórias, sonhos e medos.

programme.title: Sem Perdão
programme.desc: Vint está em um casamento problemático. Após fazer uma viagem com a esposa, eles são sequestrados e ele deixado para morrer e sua esposa desaparece. Meses depois, ele acorda do coma após o surgimento de evidências e a desistência das autoridades. As duas equipes se unem e voltam para a pequena cidade onde sua esposa foi vista pela última vez.

programme.title: O Jogo do Abismo
programme.desc: Uma caça ao tesouro em um cruzeiro se tornará uma luta pela sobrevivência para Liu e o namorado.

programme.title: Assassinatos do Passado
programme.desc: Um detetive trabalha para resolver um caso envolvendo um jovem surdo e um site de voyerismo que funciona em uma casa que pertenceu a um assassino em série.

programme.title: Sem Controle
programme.desc: A vida de um jovem vira de cabeça para baixo quando seus sonhos violentos começam a se confundir com a realidade.

programme.title: Eles Existem
programme.desc: Para cinco amigos, o final de semana em uma cabana pelos remotos bosques do Texas será uma aventura repleta de festas. Mas tudo muda quando o que parecia só diversão se torna um terror ao serem perseguidos pelo feroz e lendário Pé Grande.

programme.title: Eu Sei Onde Você Mora
programme.desc: Um homem obcecado por limpeza, tem sonhos estranhos e guarda no inconsciente um mistério do passado.

programme.title: A Possessão de Mary
programme.desc: David (Gary Oldman) é um capitão de colarinho azul que luta para melhorar a vida de sua família. Estranhamente atraído por um navio abandonado que está em leilão, David impulsivamente compra o barco, acreditando que será o bilhete de sua família para a felicidade e a prosperidade. Mas logo depois que eles embarcam em sua jornada inaugural, eventos estranhos e assustadores começam a aterrorizar David e sua família, fazendo com que se voltem um contra o outro e duvidem de sua própria sanidade.

programme.title: A Presença
programme.desc: Depois de ser sequestrado por alienígenas, um jovem cientista da NASA fica obcecado em encontrar pistas sobre o que aconteceu quando descobre que ninguém acredita que sua experiência realmente aconteceu.

programme.title: O Mistério Da Passagem Da Morte
programme.desc: Cinco estudantes norte-americanos viajam para Passagem de Dyatlov em busca de respostas sobre os eventos ocorridos na década de 1950, quando nove esquiadores russos morreram inexplicavelmente. Gravando um documentário, eles percorrem a trilha amaldiçoada dos Montes Urais e logo começam a desconfiar que não estão sozinhos no local.

programme.title: Eles Existem
programme.desc: Para cinco amigos, o final de semana em uma cabana pelos remotos bosques do Texas será uma aventura repleta de festas. Mas tudo muda quando o que parecia só diversão se torna um terror ao serem perseguidos pelo feroz e lendário Pé Grande.

programme.title: Eu Sei Onde Você Mora
programme.desc: Um homem obcecado por limpeza, tem sonhos estranhos e guarda no inconsciente um mistério do passado.

programme.title: Longe dos Homens
